name: Fenshi

skills.name: Hate Blades
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: 3-hit single target. 1.1x ATK per hit = 3.3 ATK total base (3.63 ATK fully booked with +10% damage).
30% chance per hit (40% booked) to place 30% Dec SPD. 3 hits = multiple Dec SPD proc chances. Excellent for TM control.

skills.book_value: Medium: +10% damage, +10% Dec SPD chance per hit (30%→40%). Good for Dec SPD uptime.
skills.notes: 3-hit A1 (Giant Slayer procs 3x). 40% Dec SPD chance per hit when booked (3 chances = high proc rate). Synergizes with A2 TM reduction.

skills.name: Nowhere To Run
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 15%.

effects.notes: 3-hit single target. 2.0x ATK per hit = 6.0 ATK total base (6.9 ATK fully booked with +15% damage).
50% chance per hit (75% booked) to decrease target TM by 15%. 3 hits = up to 45% TM reduction total. EXCELLENT for TM lock/control.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +15% damage, +25% TM reduction chance per hit (50%→75%), -2 cooldown (4→2). MUST BOOK for TM control viability.
skills.notes: PRIMARY TM CONTROL: 3-hit with 75% TM reduction chance per hit when booked (3 chances = very high total proc rate). Up to 45% TM reduction total. MUST BOOK for 2-turn cooldown (spammable TM control). Synergizes with A1 Dec SPD for TM lock.

skills.name: Killer's Bile
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit places a 5% [Poison] debuff on the target for 3 turns. Will ignore 10% of the target's DEF for each [Poison] debuff on the target.

effects.notes: 2-hit single target. 2.7x ATK per hit = 5.4 ATK total base (6.48 ATK fully booked with +20% damage). SCALES WITH POISON: Ignores 10% DEF per Poison debuff on target (e.g., 10 Poisons = 100% ignore DEF = full DEF ignore).
100% chance to place TWO 5% Poisons (one per hit, 2 hits total). No ACC check (always lands per Ayumilove). Excellent for Clan Boss and boss damage.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +20% damage, -1 cooldown (4→3). MUST BOOK for Poison uptime and DEF ignore scaling.
skills.notes: POISON SPECIALIST: 2-hit placing TWO 5% Poisons (100% chance, no ACC check). Damage ignores 10% DEF per Poison on target (self-synergy: 2 Poisons from A3 = 20% DEF ignore, 10 Poisons = 100% DEF ignore). MUST BOOK for 3-turn cooldown. EXCELLENT for Clan Boss (Poison specialist) and boss damage (DEF ignore scaling).

forms.comments: TM control + Poison specialist. A2 'Nowhere To Run' is 3-hit TM reduction (75% chance per hit when booked, up to 45% total TM reduction). A3 'Killer's Bile' places TWO 5% Poisons (no ACC check) + ignores 10% DEF per Poison. A1 'Hate Blades' is 3-hit Dec SPD for TM control synergy. EXCELLENT for Shadowkin Faction Wars (8/10), Doom Tower (8/10), and dungeons (8/10) with TM lock capability. Must book A2/A3 for TM control and Poison uptime.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: PRIORITY: 200+ ACC (Poison + Dec SPD), 220+ SPD (speed tuning), 100% C.RATE, 220%+ C.DMG, 3500+ ATK. A3 Poison specialist (TWO 5% Poisons, no ACC check but still needs ACC for A1 Dec SPD). Lifesteal or Speed sets.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: PRIORITY: 200+ ACC (TM reduction + Dec SPD), 220+ SPD (TM lock cycling), 100% C.RATE, 220%+ C.DMG, 3500+ ATK. A2 TM control excellent for boss TM lock. Must book A2 for 2-turn cooldown spammable TM control.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 200+ ACC (TM reduction), 250+ SPD (speed tuning), 100% C.RATE, 250%+ C.DMG, 3500+ ATK. A2 TM control viable for control teams. Not top-tier for Arena (7/10) but usable.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: PRIORITY: 200+ ACC (TM reduction + Dec SPD + Poison), 220+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, 220%+ C.DMG, 3500+ ATK. A2 TM control + A3 Poison excellent for boss waves. Must book A2/A3 for Shadowkin FW progression.

recommended_gear: Speed (220+ SPD for TM control cycling)
Cruel (C.RATE + ignore DEF synergy with A3)

clan_boss: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, GIANT SLAYER (A1 3-hit + A2 3-hit + A3 2-hit all multi-hit, Giant Slayer triggers on all skills)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof (738 DEF glass cannon)

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (+50 ACC CRITICAL for Dec SPD), MASTER HEXER (CRITICAL - extends Poison from 3→4 turns for max uptime), Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (reduces A2/A3 cooldowns)
dungeons: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, GIANT SLAYER (all skills multi-hit)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof (glass cannon protection)

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (+50 ACC CRITICAL for TM reduction + Dec SPD), Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - reduces A2 4→2 booked, A3 4→3 booked cooldowns for faster TM control cycling)
arena: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, GIANT SLAYER
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE, Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC
faction_wars: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, GIANT SLAYER (all skills multi-hit for wave clear + boss damage)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof (738 DEF glass cannon), Resurgent, Delay Death

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (+50 ACC CRITICAL for TM reduction + Dec SPD + Poison), MASTER HEXER (extends Poison 3→4 turns for boss damage), Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - faster A2 TM control + A3 Poison cycling)
masteries.general: GIANT SLAYER CRITICAL (A1 3-hit + A2 3-hit + A3 2-hit all multi-hit, Giant Slayer triggers on ALL skills for massive T6 damage). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (reduces A2 4→2 booked, A3 4→3 booked cooldowns for TM control + Poison uptime). Eagle Eye CRITICAL (+50 ACC for TM reduction + Dec SPD + Poison). Master Hexer CRITICAL for Clan Boss/FW (extends Poison 3→4 turns for max uptime). MUST BOOK A2/A3 for TM control viability (A2 4→2 cooldown = spammable TM lock) and Poison uptime (A3 4→3). Build: 100% C.RATE, 220%+ C.DMG, 200+ ACC, 220+ SPD, 3500+ ATK. Speed or Lifesteal sets. Focus: Shadowkin Faction Wars (8/10) + Doom Tower (8/10) + dungeons (8/10) with TM lock + Poison. User Priority: Faction Wars (Priority 5) - Shadowkin completed Normal, Fenshi key for Hard progression with TM control for boss waves.

blessings: Brimstone (if used in HP Burn teams - unlikely)
Polymorph (CC support synergy with TM control)
Soul Reap (cooldown reduction on kill for TM control chaining)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Good AI. Will use A3 Poison when available, A2 for TM control, A1 for filler. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not a cheese champion. Solid TM control + Poison specialist for Faction Wars and dungeons.

mechanics_advisory: TM control + Poison specialist. A2 'Nowhere To Run' is PRIMARY TM CONTROL: 3-hit with 75% TM reduction chance per hit when booked (3 chances = very high total proc rate, up to 45% total TM reduction). MUST BOOK for 2-turn cooldown = spammable TM lock. A3 'Killer's Bile' is POISON SPECIALIST: 2-hit placing TWO 5% Poisons (100% chance, no ACC check per Ayumilove) + damage ignores 10% DEF per Poison on target (self-synergy: 2 Poisons from A3 = 20% DEF ignore, 10 Poisons on target = 100% DEF ignore = full ignore). MUST BOOK for 3-turn cooldown. A1 'Hate Blades' is 3-hit Dec SPD (40% chance per hit when booked) for TM control synergy (Dec SPD + TM reduction = TM lock). EXCELLENT for Shadowkin Faction Wars (8/10) with TM lock for boss waves + Poison damage. Good for Doom Tower (8/10) and dungeons (8/10) with TM control. Good for Clan Boss (6/10) as Poison specialist (TWO 5% Poisons no ACC check). MUST BOOK A2/A3 for TM control viability and Poison uptime. Build: 100% C.RATE, 220%+ C.DMG, 200+ ACC (TM reduction + Dec SPD), 220+ SPD (TM lock cycling), 3500+ ATK. Giant Slayer CRITICAL (all skills multi-hit). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (faster A2/A3 cycling). Master Hexer CRITICAL (extends Poison 3→4 turns). Eagle Eye CRITICAL (+50 ACC). User Priority: Faction Wars (Priority 5) - Shadowkin completed Normal, Fenshi is key TM control + Poison specialist for Hard boss waves. Force affinity = weak to Magic but strong vs Spirit.
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: TM control + Poison specialist for Shadowkin FW. A2 spammable TM lock (2-turn cooldown when booked). A3 TWO Poisons (no ACC check) + DEF ignore scaling. Must book A2/A3. User priority: Shadowkin FW Hard progression.

update_notes.last_patch: Completed from DRAFT with full effects, masteries, and meta analysis. Faction Wars + Doom Tower focus. Validated against Ayumilove/HellHades. RaidWiki unavailable (500 error), stats manually extracted from Ayumilove OCR.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats manually extracted from Ayumilove OCR output (HP 16515, ATK 1465, DEF 738, SPD 97, C.RATE 15, C.DMG 60, RES 30, ACC 0). RaidWiki unavailable (500 error). 90% confidence based on OCR text match.
